title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Build a feature-rich chat application with real-time messaging using WebSockets. Implement user authentication, one-to-one and group chats, typing indicators, and message history.

title: Task Management System
description: Create a productivity app with task creation, assignment, and tracking. Include features like priority levels, due dates, reminders, and team collaboration capabilities.

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Build a full-stack e-commerce application with product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and order management. Implement search, filtering, and admin dashboard.
requirements: Product catalog with search and filters

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Create a weather application that displays current weather and forecasts using a public API. Include features like location search, multiple location tracking, and weather alerts.

title: Blogging Platform
description: Develop a complete blogging platform with user accounts, post creation, comments, and a public blog feed. Include features like markdown support, tagging, and search functionality.

title: Personal Expense Tracker
description: Build a personal finance app to track expenses and income. Include categories, budgets, reports, and data visualization with charts for spending analysis.

title: Video Streaming Platform
description: Create a video streaming service similar to YouTube with video upload, playback, comments, likes, and recommendations. Include search and categorization features.

title: Social Network Platform
description: Build a social networking application with user profiles, friend connections, posts, likes, comments, and direct messaging. Include newsfeed and notifications.

title: Project Collaboration Tool
description: Develop a tool for team project collaboration with Kanban boards, sprint planning, file sharing, and team communication. Include real-time updates and notifications.
